verbose_text: Gharibi et al previously reported that the PDGF BB induced crosstalk between these pathways affects the proliferation and adipogenic commitment of hMSCs : PDGF-BB-induced PI3K / Akt signaling enhanced the proliferative activity of the hMSCs, and PDGF-BB-induced ERK mediated signaling suppressed the adipogenic differentiation of hMSCs.
evidence: ERK-mediated signaling suppressed the adipogenic differentiation
